featured.text: Milk naturally contains salt and lactose, a sugar which the human body needs in small amounts to help stimulate water 25 .

definition.zh_def: 乳糖是一種存在於乳製品中的糖類，主要由葡萄糖和半乳糖組成。
definition.en_def: Lactose is a sugar found in milk and dairy products, composed of glucose and galactose.
definition.example: Some people are lactose intolerant and cannot digest dairy products.
